Cute and convincing internet speedtest app like fast.com. Automatically loads on open and display the current speed varying a bit and gives the result in Mbps after 10 seconds of test. Do not make a real connection speed test, just display a high random number. Read url query param "speed" if given to be the final result
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
